me.armar.plugins.autorank.api
Class API 

java.lang.Object
  me.armar.plugins.autorank.api.API

public class API
				
extends java.lang.Object

Autorank's API class:

You, as a developer, can you use this class to get data from players or data about groups. The API is never finished and if you want to see something added, tell us!

Author:
Staartvin

Method Detail

getLocalPlayTime

public int getLocalPlayTime(java.lang.String playerName)
Gets the local play time (playtime on this server) of a player.

Parameters:
playerName - player to check for.
Returns:
play time of a player. 0 when has never played before.

getMySQLDatabase

public java.lang.String getMySQLDatabase()
Gets the database name Autorank stores its global times in.

Returns:
name of database

getGlobalPlayTime

public int getGlobalPlayTime(java.lang.String playerName)
Gets the global play time (playtime across all servers with the same MySQL database linked) of a player.

Parameters:
playerName - player to check for.
Returns:
play time of a player. -1 if no entry was found.

getAllRequirements

public java.util.List<Requirement> getAllRequirements(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
Gets all requirements for a player at the exact moment. This does not consider already finished requirement but just mirrors the config file.

Parameters:
player - Player to get the requirements from.
Returns:
a list of requirement. An empty list when none are found.

getFailedRequirements

public java.util.List<Requirement> getFailedRequirements(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
Gets all requirements that are not yet completed.

Parameters:
player - Player to get the failed requirements for.
Returns:
list of requirements that still have to be completed.
